## OIT.beginPass() method

Begins rendering for the given pass.

**Signature:**

```typescript
beginPass(ctx: DrawContext, pass: number): boolean;
```

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The pass number.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the transparent objects should be rendered, false otherwise.
